alert.note: Alert for Harvey; McPherson; Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 1:43AM CDT until June 10 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McPherson County in central Kansas... Northeastern Reno County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Harvey County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Rice County in central Kansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 143 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Windom, or 10 miles northwest of Inman, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Hesston, South Hutchinson, North Newton, Moundridge, Inman, Buhler, Nickerson, Burrton, Willowbrook and Hutchinson Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 34 and 38. This replaces the previous severe thunderstorm warning for Mcpherson and Marion counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
